entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
